title: Catan
description: Build settlements, trade resources, and vie for control of the island of Catan.

title: Ticket to Ride
description: Collect train cards and claim railway routes across North America.

title: Pandemic
description: Work together as a team of specialists to contain global outbreaks and find cures in time.

title: Carcassonne
description: Draw and place tiles to build medieval landscapes and score points with your followers.

description: Attract birds to your wildlife preserves and build a powerful engine from diverse species.

title: Root
description: Lead one of the woodland factions vying for control of a vast and colorful forest.

description: Develop your civilization by drafting cards to build wonders, trade, and achieve supremacy.

title: Splendor
description: Acquire gems and cards to build prestige and attract noble patrons.

title: Clue
description: Solve the murder mystery by deducing the correct suspect, weapon, and location.

title: Monopoly
description: Buy, trade, and develop properties to bankrupt your opponents in this classic game of capitalism.

title: UNO
description: Match colors and numbers to be the first to get rid of all your cards.

title: Risk
description: Deploy armies, forge alliances, and conquer the world in this classic game of global domination.

title: Betrayal at House on the Hill
description: Explore a haunted mansion and uncover terrifying secrets—until one player turns traitor and the haunting begins.

title: Gloomhaven
description: Lead a band of mercenaries through a sprawling world of tactical combat and branching storylines.
